com.peterson.markovbot

Class SynchronizedMarkovBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.peterson.markovbot.MarkovBot
      • com.peterson.markovbot.SynchronizedMarkovBot

  • public class SynchronizedMarkovBot
extends MarkovBot
    Extension of the base MarkovBot to expose functionality of concurrency constructs. This class wraps the critical sections present in MarkovBot with concurrent counterparts; internally, a synchronized List (part of this class) and synchronized Map (part of the generator).
    Author:
    Peterson, Ryan Created: 6/4/15

    • Constructor Detail

      • SynchronizedMarkovBot

        public SynchronizedMarkovBot()
        Creates a SynchronizedMarkovBot. Uses thread-safe constructs.

      • SynchronizedMarkovBot

        public SynchronizedMarkovBot(java.io.File inFile)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a SynchronizedMarkovBot. Uses thread-safe constructs and is initialized with a seed file.
        Parameters:
        inFile - the input file to use to seed the chain
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an read error occurs

      • SynchronizedMarkovBot

        public SynchronizedMarkovBot(java.io.File inFile,
                             boolean createNew)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a SynchronizedMarkovBot. Uses thread-safe constructs, initializes itself with a seed file, and will create a new file to save its state in.
        Parameters:
        inFile - the input file
        createNew - true to create a new file to save the content in
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a read/write error occurs.
